channel.title: Exp Rates!
channel.description: I'm using Wolf's Blitzscape and would really love to know how to change the exp rates you get from combat. At the moment, each hit gives too much exp and i need to lower it, any help would be apreciated![br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2007, 12:33:06 PM[/size][hr]Anybody ?

item.title: Exp Rates!
item.dc:creator: @Il_Range_Il Il Range Il
item.description:
@Il_Range_Il wrote:

I’m using Wolf’s Blitzscape and would really love to know how to change the exp rates you get from combat.
At the moment, each hit gives too much exp and i need to lower it, any help would be apreciated![br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2007, 12:33:06 PM[/size][hr]Anybody ?
